meanings.definition: Not twisted or bent out of shape.
meanings.sent1: The mirror reflected an undistorted image of the room.
meanings.sent2: The camera lens captured an undistorted view of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her hair looked undistorted after the windy walk.
meanings.sent4: His undistorted opinion on the matter was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The undistorted truth shone through the lies.
